Title: Authorizes the sanitary code to establish regulations for separation and segregation of recyclable materials and facilities for the disposal of solid waste
Summary: Authorizes the sanitary code to establish regulations for separation and segregation of recyclable or reusable materials and facilities for the disposal of solid waste.
LawCode: Amd ยง225, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to authorizing the sanitary code to establish regulations for source separation and segregation of recyclable or reusable materials and adequate facilities for disposal of solid waste
